Headline: Delays Affecting Red, Yellow and Purple Line Trains
ShortDescription: Red, Yellow and Purple Line trains are running with significant delays due to track switching problems in the area of Howard. Update to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red, Yellow and Purple Line trains are running with significant delays due to track switching problems in the area of Howard.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed/correct the problem and restore normal travel times through the area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
